snippet: The experts in blending scents no longer work behind the scenes, as perfume brands seek a pedigree.
abstract: Many behind-the-scenes perfumers who blend scents for celebrity fragrances are stepping out into the limelight and launching their own perfume brands. Photos (M)2
lead_paragraph: WANT to smell like Cosmic Radiance? (According to Britney Spears, the perfume is a musky mix of citrus fruits and white flowers.) Or you, too, can feel as Lovely as Sarah Jessica Parker, play Truth or Dare like Madonna or ooze the official scent of Jennifer Aniston through your pores. ''The celebrities all have a perfume now,'' said Francis Kurkdjian, 42, an accomplished perfumer in Paris. ''But how many more out there really have a salable name? They are less and less 'real' celebrities. At some point the consumers will move on to something new, the next trend.''
